name: Wrath of the Eden
description:
A classic Doom-style Dungeon Crawler game, taking minds back into the classic 93's.

Taking place in America, where you're an Amish guy heading deep into a dungeon with a mace, diving deeper and deeper to smash some blobs and bones into bits. Only mystery lies deep within the crypt, and it's up to you to discover what's down there.

Currently only has a level 1, made purely for educational purpose, hope you all enjoy!

Features!!!
  • 3 Fully Animated Weapons
  • 2 Fully Animated Enemies
  • Original Animation, Art, Mechanic and UIs!
  • References to games that inspired the game!
